org.apache.giraph.edge

类 DefaultEdge<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.edge.DefaultEdge<I,E>
  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex index
    E - Edge value
    所有已实现的接口:
    Edge<I,E>, MutableEdge<I,E>, ReusableEdge<I,E>

    public class DefaultEdge<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends Object
implements ReusableEdge<I,E>
    A complete edge, the target vertex and the edge value. Can only be one edge with a destination vertex id per edge map.
